[size=10][color=orange][b]What is it?[/b][/color][/size]

You are already sick of the vanilla Skyrim, that means without color? Should try to install some mods that will put him with a new face.

[size=10][color=orange][b]How?[/b][/color][/size]

Downloading some mods highly skilled


__________________________________________________
[size=10][color=red][b]IMPORTANT:All mods were not made ??by me but by people who know what to do. Everyone is in the credits.[/b][/color][/size]


[size=10][color=orange][b]Go on download the pdf and folow the tutorial[/b][/color][/size] 


[size=5][color=white][b]The fact you would download everything in the right order,to not cause any problems[/b][/color][/size]
